name: Supratim Biswas
content: Home page of Supratim Biswas Supratim BiswasProfessor Computer Science and Engineering,Indian Institute of Technology Bombay,Powai,Mumbai 400 076, India Phone: +91-22-2576 7715 Fax: +91-22-2572 0290Email: sb [at] cse.iitb.ac.in Res : B-285, 12th floor, NILGIRI Phone: +91-22-2576 8715 / +91-22-25724842 Career Administrative Roles Research Teaching Students Curriculum Design HRD Activities Professional Activities Miscellaneous Research Interest Programming Languages, Compiler Optimization, Parallelizing Compilers, Parallel and Distributed computing, Combinatorial Optimization Career Professor, CSE Department since 1995. Visiting Fellow at the Center for Supercomputing Research and Development (CSRD) at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign (UIUC), 1992 -93. Associate Professor in CSE in 1990. Assistant Professor in CSE in 1985. Lecturer in Computer Center in 1980. Ph. D. in Compiler Optimization, IIT Kharagpur, 1981. Administrative Roles Member Board of Governors (BOG) , IIT Bombay, since January 2014 Chairman Senate Nominations Committee (SNC), 2011 to 2013 Dean of Academic Programs, IIT Bombay, 2007 to 2010 Convener Cross Institute Program Committee (CIPC) IITB-Monash Academy, 2008 to 10. Director, IITB-Monash Academy, 2009 to 2010 Head of Computer Science and Engineering Department, 2000 to 2003 Organizing Vice Chairman JEE, from 1996 to 1997 Research Teaching Students Academic Research Sponsored Research Industrial Consultancy Selected Publications Institute Courses Laboratory CEP Courses ... Doctoral Students M Tech Students B Tech & M Sc Students External Students Curriculum Design Human Resources Professional Activities 2007 Curriculum Implementation Change of Branch Academic Task Force IPE and ARP UG Teaching Asst Governing Council Selection Committee Expert/Steering Committee Workshop Organization IIT Bombay | CSE | Page under construction.
